• Capistrano recipe: update your remote shared assets and database to your local application – as the title says, useful? not now.. buy maybe later.
  • Facebook Connect Vs. Twitter Login – Which is more evil? i don’t know yet.
  • Rails app configuration – i am a fan of a simple OpenStruct hash, but it’s here anyway.
  • Ruby interface to GitHub api – when it’s more mature, we’ll might need it in our office back office.
  • Ubiquity practices – I love ubiquity, these are some pretty good tips in order to harness it to productivity.
  • Capistrano Growl notifications – Win! that’s it.
